paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A greater prevalence of mutations amongst female cases was seen with respect to LQTS/BrS risk-mutations (p = 0.03).

functional_data.summary: Variant associated with Long QT Syndrome Type 2.

variants.additional_notes: This variant has been previously associated with disease.
key_quotes: A novel truncation p.W323* was detected in KCNQ1 and predicted to cause nonsense-mediated decay.
Two were disease-associated mutations (variants C and V in Table 1).

tables_processed.table_caption: Rare Variants identified in SADS Cases

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were successfully extracted.
